column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Jill - Thank you for your 5-star review. We greatly appreciate your kind words and we hope you'll visit us again soon. Also
column2: you are correct -- we do experience extended wait times during peak dining hours
column4: especially if you're in a large party of three or more guests. We appreciate your patience
column5: and we hope you'll come through again soon.
